All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Represents the game board containing cases for the player to move on.
Case
Represents a single cell (case) on the game board.
Case.CellType
Cell types for the board (empty, bonus, enemy, final).
Character
Represents a character in the KillTheDragon game.
DefensiveEquipment
Represents a defensive equipment item that can be used.
Dice
Represents a dice used in the game to generate a random roll.
Enemy
Represents an enemy character in the game.
Game
Represents the main game logic and handles user interaction in the game.
Inventory
Represents an inventory which can contain offensive and defensive equipment.
Main
 
Menu
Handles user input and displaying messages in the console menu.
OffensiveEquipment
Represents an offensive equipment item used for attack.
